reviewText:
I am surprised how much I liked this movie.  I don't like animal movies, but I do like 70's made for tv movies.  This was more about the animals and how to trap them, versus the attack movies of the era.
The beautiful lion cub "star" of the movie is the cutest thing!
I think that this is a fun movie that kids of a certain age could watch.  We used to watch Mutual of Omaha when I was a kid.
Really like the ending.
It's a Hanna-Barbera production.

Made in Texas in the mid 70's. And it show what Hollywierd thinks Texas is like. Rednecks running around in pickups with guns. Too many plot holes and continuity errors to count.

I had to rate it ***** because I was in it. Otherwise I don't think I would have purchased it.
I saw this movie along time ago when it first aired on TV and loved it
